example.title: KeepSelectedRecords
example.metakeywords: php grid, php ajax grid, php datagrid, php gridview, ajax grid php
example.description: KoolGrid supports rows selection persistence feature. The selected rows will be persisted after postback and callback. In above example, you can try to select rows and navigate back and forth among pages.
